thread.title_full: Paddy Power reviewed by J Arnold

author: J Arnold
title: J Arnold
text:
Two weeks ago I noticed that Â£100 had been taken out of my bank account from my joint account which was not registered by me or my wife (who does not gamble) I contacted Paddy Power who said they would look into it, chasing them 3 days later they wanted a form filled in which I did immediately. I resent this as for 15 hours they said they hadn't received it. I chased them by phone and email on several occasions. My account was suspended. No replies were received from PP. Totally ignorant. I have just received a reply were they stated they can see no wrong usage on the account and for me to contact the police. Also when I agree no action is needed they will unlock my account.
I replied that I would not be using them any more.
I believe their systems have been compromised.
I also saw another account has complained about hacking.
From mine and other complaints I suggest as many people as possible avoid Paddy Power at all costs.
